3: This won't do. Turning them off by hand is too inefficient. There might be up to hundreds of these devices here.
Can't we just use EMP grenades like in the Museum Estate?
That's Strike Hawk equipment. Not Gray Raven.
But I know you have a habit of holding onto at least one of any new devices you find.
You really are something else, Captain.
But one single EMP won't do much. It'll also have to be detonated at the right location.
